DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess neck low back pain use Electrical Impedance Myography ( EIM ) order develop algorithm aid primary care provider ( PCPs ) diagnosis neck/back pain . Secondary goal include refinement EIM technology associate software ease-of-use interpretation PCPs staff .
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Impedance Myography Neck Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: 1 . Radiculopathy Subjects : Age 2180 year old History consistent radiculopathy base clinical , radiologic , standard electrophysiological criterion , determine spine expert ( Dr. John Keel ) Age 21 80 History generalize neuromuscular condition , except mild polyneuropathy common mononeuropathy ( e.g. , carpal tunnel syndrome , ulnar neuropathy elbow ) History moderatetosevere ongoing medical condition produce generalized disability , advance cardiac renal disease Metal spine implant type 2 . Musculoskeletal Back Pain Subjects : Age 21 80 year old Low back neck pain without evidence suggest neuropathic component ; i.e. , without radiation pain , sensory loss weakness Age 21 80 History sciatica cervical radiculopathy History generalize neuromuscular condition , except mild polyneuropathy common mononeuropathy ( e.g. , carpal tunnel syndrome , ulnar neuropathy elbow ) History moderatetosevere ongoing medical condition produce generalized disability , advance cardiac renal disease Metal spine implant type 3 . Undiagnosed Lower Back Neck Pain Subjects : Age 21 80 year old Major complaint lower back neck pain Age 21 80 Recent ( < 6 month ) history similar symptom evaluate History generalize neuromuscular condition , except mild polyneuropathy common mononeuropathy ( e.g. , carpal tunnel syndrome , ulnar neuropathy elbow ) History moderatetosevere ongoing medical condition produce generalized disability , advance cardiac renal disease Metal spine implant type
